meta.description: Optimize the travel route for a delivery driver to minimize total travel cost visiting each shop exactly once and returning to the start.

sets.name: SHOPS
sets.description: List of shops the driver needs to visit.

params.name: travel_cost
params.description: Cost of traveling between each pair of shops.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Binary variable indicating if the driver travels from one shop to another.

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(travel_cost[i][j] * x[i][j] for i in SHOPS for j in SHOPS if i != j)
objective.description: Minimize the total travel cost for the delivery route.

constraints.name: visit_each_shop_once_Shop1
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['Shop1'][j] for j in SHOPS if j != 'Shop1')
constraints.description: Ensure the driver leaves Shop1 exactly once.

constraints.name: visit_each_shop_once_Shop2
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['Shop2'][j] for j in SHOPS if j != 'Shop2')
constraints.description: Ensure the driver leaves Shop2 exactly once.

constraints.name: visit_each_shop_once_Shop3
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['Shop3'][j] for j in SHOPS if j != 'Shop3')
constraints.description: Ensure the driver leaves Shop3 exactly once.

constraints.name: visit_each_shop_once_Shop4
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['Shop4'][j] for j in SHOPS if j != 'Shop4')
constraints.description: Ensure the driver leaves Shop4 exactly once.

constraints.name: visit_each_shop_once_Shop5
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['Shop5'][j] for j in SHOPS if j != 'Shop5')
constraints.description: Ensure the driver leaves Shop5 exactly once.

constraints.name: enter_each_shop_once_Shop1
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x[i]['Shop1'] for i in SHOPS if i != 'Shop1')
constraints.description: Ensure the driver enters Shop1 exactly once.

constraints.name: enter_each_shop_once_Shop2
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x[i]['Shop2'] for i in SHOPS if i != 'Shop2')
constraints.description: Ensure the driver enters Shop2 exactly once.

constraints.name: enter_each_shop_once_Shop3
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x[i]['Shop3'] for i in SHOPS if i != 'Shop3')
constraints.description: Ensure the driver enters Shop3 exactly once.

constraints.name: enter_each_shop_once_Shop4
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x[i]['Shop4'] for i in SHOPS if i != 'Shop4')
constraints.description: Ensure the driver enters Shop4 exactly once.

constraints.name: enter_each_shop_once_Shop5
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x[i]['Shop5'] for i in SHOPS if i != 'Shop5')
constraints.description: Ensure the driver enters Shop5 exactly once.
